description: A React functional component named ETACards that displays Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) information for buses on a selected route. It filters buses by route number, provides multilingual support, and renders ETA cards for each active bus or a message if none are active.

methods.name: ETACards({ buses = [], stops = [], route, language })
methods.description: React functional component that renders ETA cards for buses on a specific route with multilingual support.
